name: Spinorama
description: A smooth, meditative show of spinning, chasing, and pulsing lights with gentle color fades.
narrative_intro: Spinorama is a celebration of motionâ€”lights chase, spin, and fade in a whirl of color. Now, the carousel turns slowly, inviting you to watch the colors blend.

steps.narrative: Golden lights begin a slow, graceful spin.
Aqua joins the spin, gently weaving through the gold.
A pink pulse glides around, fading softly through the palette.
Lavender spins slowly, blending with the others.
White pulses drift from the center, fading to stillness.
The lights slow to a stop, gently fading to black.
